review: My family really likes this streamer! We've always used Roku, but decided to try this because of the price. In the beginning, I was concerned because it kept losing the wifi signal, but that seems to have corrected itself. It gets all the apps that my family uses to stream, which some other streaming sticks do not.  I'm really happy that I can now get HBO Now on it.  We actually plan on buying more as soon as we upgrade our other televisions to ones that it's compatible with. This really is a great device - especially for the price!
